website_summaries.verdict: A great starter set for those who need sharp, safe knives, but perhaps not the most sophisticated.
pros: We love the colorful set and its visual fun
A great gift for those in need of a simple set of knives with some extra flare
According to customers, this set is expected to hold up after several uses
cons: The blade is not even, creating some discomfort for some when cutting

customer_reviews.title: ... knife and the large orange knives are my absolute favorite knives. The Cheese and Pizza knives are totally ...
customer_reviews.text: The large red knife and the large orange knives are my absolute favorite knives. The Cheese and Pizza knives are totally useless for me, and make life miserable, but the others make up for it. Plus the price was hard to beat.
customer_reviews.author: B. Aguirre

customer_reviews.title: great!
customer_reviews.text: These look kind of cheap but I took the risk and so far I've only used one but it was great! The breadknife worked great. I tried the grater but it was a bit of a cheapy plastic one.
customer_reviews.author: ashley93_love

customer_reviews.title: Good Price, As Described, Sharp
customer_reviews.text: They seem OK for the price. Peeler is flimsy. Colors are fun. The words PIZZA and CHEESE cut out of blades creates more area for food to stick/pull/adhere, and thus a need to pay more attention when washing knives. These are new for us and not time-tested.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: they're great. If this changes
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son who is an active duty soldier living in the barracks with a kitchen. So far no complaints and for a first knife set, they're great. If this changes, I'll update my post.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great overall.
customer_reviews.text: Great overall. Pizza knife is too short to work well and does not cut crust well. The others are fine so far.
customer_reviews.author: TEC

customer_reviews.title: These are great knives, especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are great knives, especially for the price. I just wish they had come with covers like others I had purchased from Chopmate.
customer_reviews.author: Deana DeWitt

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Like the knifes but wish they had covers for the blades like some other products do
customer_reviews.author: WJ

customer_reviews.title: Holders
customer_reviews.text: Love love love! I think they need plastic holders and not the cardboard- I love them so much I don’t want to ruin them
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Dezio

customer_reviews.title: ... using these for over a month now and there great for the price I would recommend
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these for over a month now and there great for the price I would recommend them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They all cut great! It make a nice Christmas present!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good knife set for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The knives came sharp & ready to use out of the box. They comfortable handles that have a good grip to them. The peeler is also a nice add on. I'm using these for work in a restaurant & it can be a good starter knife set for a new cook. I also have a Chefmate knife set & this is just as good. I recommend getting sheaths if you plan to travel with these knives.
customer_reviews.author: T. Smith

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Simply not sharp, but they were very cheap. Lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Love this set!!
customer_reviews.text: Not only are they beautiful (I love the various colors!), they’re sharp and comfortable to hold. They’re safe for the dishwasher which is one of the best features! And to top it all off? The free/bonus peeler is the best I’ve ever used - it’s AMAZING!!!!! This is an excellent value for the money!!
customer_reviews.author: NikkiNoodle1127Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these mostly for the cheese knife, but it doesn't work the way I want it to. (I'm right handed and I cut from the right side of the block. The blade isn't the even on both sides, so to make an actual slice I have to cut from the left and it feels awkward.) The peeler that comes with it is made of plastic and doesn't work great. I plan on keeping the set because I do like this slicer knife better than my own. The other knives seem okay. Wish these came with real sheaths.
customer_reviews.author: Hammondbeat Records

customer_reviews.title: Great set of knives
customer_reviews.text: Husband and I had been to a relative house and was helping prepare meal. He used one of these and said it was great for cutting and lightweight. It sold him.
customer_reviews.author: PGB

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: We love these knives. They work well and are sharp. I love the colors and the price! We haven't had any issues at all.
customer_reviews.author: JessieJ

customer_reviews.title: I love mine. Updated  they are still very sharp and we use them every single day! Thank
customer_reviews.text: There right on time I love colorful knives and the way that everything is becoming more colorful! They are very well package and I love the way that they show with everything is for an antibacterial!
customer_reviews.author: Amber photogbellidance

customer_reviews.title: Got these a year ago and they are great!!
customer_reviews.text: Got these a year ago and they are great!!! Still sharp and they cut really well! They came as i expected and are strong and sharp!
customer_reviews.author: Eric and Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice and light weight, but do not hold an edge very well.
customer_reviews.author: todd lindsey

customer_reviews.title: CHOP MATE KNIFE SET
customer_reviews.text: Very nice & useful knife set. Love the color & designs. Will be using them daily, especially the cheese and bread knife. One suggestion is Chop Mate should offer a knife block to go with these beautiful knives so I can store them safely.
customer_reviews.author: roundtrips

customer_reviews.title: Kitchen must have.
customer_reviews.text: I love these colorful knives. Perfect in every way.Great addition to my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Super sharp!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for use after we finish moving. I had to hide them because everyone loves them! Super sharp !
customer_reviews.author: Kasondra Ham

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift for a friend. They work like magic. Great product for the price. The colors are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Shana T.

customer_reviews.title: Good Knives
customer_reviews.text: My wife thinks these knives are the best thing since the Hula Hoop. Sharp and colorful, handy to have around.
customer_reviews.author: Bill 32958

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I use these nice all the time in their excellent their sharp
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis

customer_reviews.title: Good knives but the paint comes off onto food.
customer_reviews.text: My Husband purchased these knives about a year ago. Very sharp, lightweight, not well balanced, though we could live with that. We were pretty happy with them for a few weeks then noticed the paint was coming off the bottoms of the blades. Didn't think much of it at first, just ware and tear. But within a few months the paint was coming off the full blade and onto our food. Even just slicing a meatloaf, or even warm bread we noticed paint through each slice of food. It eas enough for us to throw them out and look for something else.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Miller

customer_reviews.title: fun knive set
customer_reviews.text: Decent, fun knive set. Bought as a gift and was well-received.
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Sharp Knife Set
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome knife set. I used the small blue knife to filet a fish and it worked very easy. These knifes are sharp and I really like all the colors. I tried to filet the fish with one of my other serated knives first and that didn't work so this knife worked really well for me. I like the cheese knife with the word cut out of it.
customer_reviews.author: C and Bhappy

customer_reviews.title: Colorful cutlery set
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set. Will enjoy this in my new home
customer_reviews.author: David Moore

product_meta.title: Chopmate Color Stainless Steel Anti-Bacterial Non-Stick Ceramic Coated 8 Piece Kitchen Knife Set
product_meta.description:
The Chopmate brand was established in 1970. All Chopmate products are manufactured worldwide under strict quality standards and specifications. The products are designed for the value conscious customer who wants a quality product for their everyday needs. All products are fully guaranteed against defects in materials and craftsmanship.

FEATURES AND BENEFITS
✓ High-quality pure stainless steel blades
✓ Anti-bacterial ceramic coating
✓ Up to 2x sharper than other brands
✓ Holds edge 10x longer
✓ Non-stick cleans easily
✓ BPA free

8" Chef Knife
One of our most popular knives, the versatile, multipurpose 8" Chef's Knife is a must-have for every serious cook.

8" Bread Knife
Perfect all-around bread knife cuts through everything from slender, crusty baguettes to softer sandwich breads.

8" Slicer Knife
Essential for carving meats and poultry, as well as for slicing fruits and vegetables.

5.2" Cheese Knife
Long, slender blade that curves up to a pronged tip at the end, suitable for slicing medium to hard cheeses and picking up slices.

5" Utility Knife
All-purpose knife is ideal for anything from trimming and peeling vegetables and fruits to small chopping and slicing tasks.

4" Pizza Knife
Curved blade simply rocks back and forth over the pizza in order to create slices that cut through the crust every time.

3.5" Paring Knife
Ideal for anything from trimming and peeling vegetables and fruits to small chopping and slicing tasks.

Peeler
Whether peeling a apple or a fruit with a tougher skin, this Y-peeler is most suitable for the task.
feature_bullets: Ceramic Coating for Easy Non-Stick Slicing
Color Coding Helps You to Reduce the Risk of Cross-Contamination During Food Preparation
8" Chef Knife, 8" Bread Knife, 8" Slicer Knife, 5.2" Cheese Knife, 5" Utility Knife, 4" Pizza Knife, 3.5" Paring Knife, Peeler
